articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Songdowon International Children's Camp
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Songdowon International Children's Camp
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the Songdowon International Children's Camp.
					 He looked round various places of the camp to learn about its management and operation.
					
					 Going round the nose-dive waterslide newly installed in the outdoor wading pool, he said the longer he watched it, the more wonderful it looked, adding children would like it. He noted with satisfaction: "I am very pleased to see it as it was made by our own efforts and with our own technique. It looks nice with the brand of 'Taedonggang'".
					
					 He appreciated its successful installing, instructing officials to let the next-term campers fully enjoy it.
					
					 Watching the newly built diving tower and water tank, he appreciated their successful building. He told officials to ensure a proper filtering of water so that the outdoor wading pool may be full of clean water.
					
					 After going round the newly arranged mirror house, he was pleased to see the number of playing grounds for children increasing at the camp day by day.
					
					 Very pleased that endless laughter of children will be heard from the camp, he said this cheerful laughter of children would instill the conviction of victory and optimism into our people.
					
					 Going round the aquarium, he was pleased that species and numbers of rare fishes including shark increased. While looking round the beach, he told officials to provide the camp with sailboats so that campers may enjoy marine sports.
					
					 He moved to Songdowon Railway Station for the camp's exclusive use now under construction. 
					
					 "Now that direct train service is available for campers and arrangements have been made for its operation, it is necessary to build the station well to suit the nature of its service, while providing the best convenience of the campers," he said.
					
					 Underscoring the need to manage well the camp which was built by the party with much effort, he set forth tasks to be fulfilled to manage and operate it.
					
					 He had a photo taken with officials, teachers and employees of the camp.
					
					 He was accompanied by Han Kwang Sang, Ma Won Chun and Kim Yo Jong.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Malawi
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Malawi
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Arthur Peter Mutharika, president of Malawi, on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue growing strong, wishing the president and people of Malawi success in the work to achieve the independent development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greeting to President of Comoros
articles.content:
Greeting to President of Comoros
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Ikililou Dhoinine, president of Comoros, on the occasion of the 39th anniversary of its independence.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue growing strong, the message wished the president and people of Comoros success in the work to achieve the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Vietnamese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Vietnamese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Vietnam General Confederation of Labor led by Vice-President Mai Duc Chinh visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the immortal story about the old home in Mangyongdae where the President was born, the members of the delegation went round historic relics preserved with much care.
					
					 They went round historic relics on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 The head of the delegation said:
					
					 The old home in Mangyongdae left deep impression on us.
					
					 The President was born into a simple family and grew up to be the great revolutionary.
					
					 His family members devoted themselves to the struggle for the independence of the country.
					
					 Here we came to know well how noble the revolutionary spirit of the President and his family members in Mangyongdae was.
					
					 The old home in Mangyongdae is instilling ardent patriotism into the Korean people who are building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The guests also visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, Monument to the Three Charters for National Reunification, the Grand People's Study House, etc.

articles.title: Delegations of Koreans in China Here
articles.content:
Delegations of Koreans in China Here
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Association of Korean Businessmen in China headed by Chairman Pyo Song Ryong, a delegation of the Association for Economic and Cultural Exchange of Korean Nationality in Dandong City, China headed by Chairman Kim Thaek Ryong and a delegation of the Aged Men Association in Shenyang City, China headed by Kim Yon Ju, department director of the General Association of Koreans in China, arrived here on Sunday to commemorate the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Families of Overseas Koreans Here
articles.content:
Families of Overseas Koreans Here
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The family of Zhang Weihua, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, families of Chai Shiying, Jiang Zihua and Shang Yue, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, family of Korean Li Zade, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter in China, and family of Korean Ri Kwan Rin related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle in China, arrived here on Sunday to commemorate the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Bereaved Family of DPRK Hero An Tong Su Pays Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Bereaved Family of DPRK Hero An Tong Su Pays Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su, visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Sunday on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of the President's demise.
					 She laid a floral basket before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: 445,900 People Visited Monument Inscribed with Kim Il Sung's Signature
articles.content:
445,900 People Visited Monument Inscribed with Kim Il Sung's Signature
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The monument inscribed with President Kim Il Sung's signature has been visited by a great number of people including service personnel of the Korean People's Army, youth and students, overseas Koreans and foreigners.
					They are deeply moved to see the letters "Kim Il Sung July 7, 1994" an autographic signature inscribed on the monument reflective of the lifelong dedication of the President to the nation's cause of reunification, and his desire for reunification.
					
					The President set forth lines and policies for national reunification in each period and at each stage of the developing revolution and wisely led the struggle for realizing them.
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il made sure that the granite monument inscribed with the signature was erected at Panmunjom to convey down through generations the President's feats for national reunification.
					
					The visitors looked back on the efforts made by the President who devoted his everything to national reunification till the last moments of his life since the first day of the nation's division.
					
					The number of visitors has reached more than 445,900 including south Koreans, overseas Koreans and foreigners and the number of organizations at least 27 680 including an Italian delegation of assemblymen from different political parties, foreign minister of Thailand, president of the World Federation of Democratic Youth, diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here and home- visiting groups of Koreans in the U.S.
					
					The monument is a witness of history clearly showing who sincerely wishes for reunification and who wishes for division, the visitors said, adding that the President was a peerless patriot who worked heart and soul till the last moments of his life for Korea's reunification and that the reunification so much desired by him will surely come true.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Wish for Reunification Will Come True: Chief of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Wish for Reunification Will Come True: Chief of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The lifelong desire of President Kim Il Sung will come true as Marshal Kim Jong Un is being held high as the lodestar for national reunification.
					 Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF), said this when interviewed by KCNA on Sunday.
					
					 The chief said the President personally examined a document related to the national reunification 20 years ago and left an autograph "Kim Il Sung July 7, 1994". He went on:
					
					 These letters reflect the noble and great life of the legendary great man who loved the country and the nation so much.
					
					 For the President the national reunification was the biggest present and joy he could give the nation.
					
					 Feeling sorrow more than others over the misfortune of the nation divided by outsiders, the President set forth a number of ways for reunification including the three principles of national reunification, 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and led the nation to realize them.
					
					 All the proposals for reunification set forth by the President are splendid ones of loving the country, nation and people.
					
					 The President is alive in the hearts of all the Koreans as he pioneered the cause of national reunification and led it along the road of victory with his transparent independent spirit, broad magnanimity and outstanding leadership.
					
					 The national reunification movement is being led by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Whoever wishes for the reunification of the country and the peace and prosperity of the nation should uphold with loyalty the leadership of the Marshal.
					
					 The vanguard fighters of the AINDF will always take the lead in the nationwide struggle for realizing the cause of national reunification, the chief stressed.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statue of Kim Il Sung at Yuwen Middle School in Jilin, China
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statue of Kim Il Sung at Yuwen Middle School in Jilin, China
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Koreans in China placed floral baskets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at Yuwen Middle School in Jilin on July 3 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.
					 Present there were Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the General Association of Koreans in China, other Koreans in China, the consul general and staff members of the DPRK consulate general in Shenyang, families of Koreans related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle in China and members of DPRK branches working in the three provinces in the northeastern area of China.
					
					 Also among the participants were the deputy department head of the Foreign Affairs Office of the Jilin Provincial People's Government, the director of the Foreign Affairs Office of the Jilin City People's Government, officials of the Jilin City Security Department, principal of Yuwen Middle School and other Chinese.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statue of the President and paid tribute.

articles.title: Public Presentation of Ministry of People's Armed Forces on Greatness of Kim Il Sung Held
articles.content:
Public Presentation of Ministry of People's Armed Forces on Greatness of Kim Il Sung Held
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- There took place the public presentation of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces on greatness of President Kim Il Sung on Sunday to commemorate the 20th anniversary of his demise.
					 The event was held on the subjects of "The Great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung is eternal sun of mankind revered by all peoples", "The Great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung is peerless brilliant commander who started our revolution with arms and led it to victory", "The Great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung is peerless great man who created new history of single-minded unity with noble comradeship and obligation", and "The Great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung is great sage of revolution who devoted himself to the country and people going through all sorts of hardships".
					
					 The floor was taken by Army General Ri Yong Gil, chief of the KPA General Staff, KPA General Hyon Yong Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA Colonel General Kang Phyo Yong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, and KPA Lieutenant General Ryom Chol Song.
					
					 The speakers said:
					
					 The greatest of the feats performed by the President is that he fathered the immortal Juche idea to indicate a genuine path for the oppressed Korean people and progressives to carve out their destinies.
					
					 The President strengthened the KPA into the army of the party and the leader throughout his life and devoted himself to the development of the army into an invincible revolutionary army strong enough to defeat any formidable enemy at a single stroke.
					
					 He formed the integral whole of all the service personnel and people who share the same intention and feelings with his warm comradely love.
					
					 He set forth the guidelines of revolution and steadfastly adhered to them in the practical struggle to overcome the severe trials and ordeals.
					
					 The speakers called for strengthening the KPA into the army of the leader and the party true to the leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present at the pubic presentation were officials of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and KPA generals, officers and men.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. for Taking Issue with DPRK over Its Measures for Self-Defence
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. for Taking Issue with DPRK over Its Measures for Self-Defence
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is terming the DPRK's tactical guided missile test-fire and tactical rocket launching drill a "provocation" for no reason.
					 A deputy spokesperson of the U.S. Department of State said the information about the rockets is under analysis to grasp their correct type, asserting it is impossible to open to public the information about the launching as it pertains to top secrecy and there is no information to reveal at present. The spokesperson blustered that the rocket launching of north Korea is problematic as it escalates tension and poses a threat and that it is the basic principle of the U.S. government that it is opposed to any launching of north Korea.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a commentary observes in this regard:
					
					 It is not a provocation and threat that the U.S. develops and tests latest weapons in a bid to invade other countries and its followers make ballistic missile test-fire but it is a provocation and threat that the DPRK bolsters up its war deterrence. This is the gangster-like logic of the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. is taking issue with the DPRK over its rocket launching for self-defence, terming it "provocation" and "threat." Lurking behind this is an ulterior design of the U.S. to shift the blame for the escalated tension in the region wholly on to the DPRK and thus attain its sinister purpose. 
					
					 "Provocation", "threat" and the like let loose by the hostile forces only sound like a pitiful cry of those frightened by the might of the DPRK.
					
					 It is the inviolable legitimate exercise of the sovereignty that the DPRK has bolstered up its deterrence force for self-defence to defend the security and peace of the country and firmly safeguard the gains of the revolution.
					
					 No matter what other may say, the DPRK will as ever exercise its justifiable right to self-defence to cope with the vicious moves of the U.S. against it and further develop and round off the Juche-based rocket science and technology and firing methods.

articles.title: Earthquake Occurs in Waters off Ulsan, S. Korea
articles.content:
Earthquake Occurs in Waters off Ulsan, S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- An earthquake measuring 3.5 on the Richter scale jolted waters 35 kilometers northeast of Ulsan, south Korea on July 3, according to south Korean KBS.
					 Tremors were reportedly felt in the areas near Kyongju and Ulsan, North Kyongsang Province.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Demise Observed by Newspaper of Koreans in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Demise Observed by Newspaper of Koreans in Uzbekistan
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Thongil, the newspaper of Koreans in Uzbekistan, on July 3 carried a special write-up on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Under the bannerline "July 8 marks 20th anniversary of demise of H.E. Kim Il Sung, the eternal President of the DPRK" the paper carried photos of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, his old home in Mangyongdae, Lake Chon of Mt. Paektu and the Arch of Triumph.
					
					 It also carried an article introducing magnolia, the national flower of Korea, loved by the President.
					
					 It carried an article introducing the Okryu Children's Hospital which has been built into the best healthcare service base for children in the world under the care of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also seen in it is the special proposal sent by the National Defence Commission of the DPRK to the south Korean authorities to open up a new phase of improving the north-south relations by taking hold on the three principles of independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity.

articles.title: DPRK's Measures to Defend Sovereignty and Dignity of Nation Supported by Guinean Figure
articles.content:
DPRK's Measures to Defend Sovereignty and Dignity of Nation Supported by Guinean Figure
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Banou Keita, chairman of the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association, in a statement on June 25 expressed support for the measures taken by the DPRK to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the nation. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 Though more than six decades have passed since the Korean war ceased, the U.S. imperialists still keep their forces in south Korea and commit all kinds of crimes there, defying the demand of the Korean people and other progressives of the world. 
					
					 The touch-and-go situation is prevailing on the Korean peninsula owing to the ever-more escalating moves of the U.S. imperialists for aggression. 
					
					 Finding fault with the DPRK for no justifiable reason over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes, the U.S. is escalating the vicious cycle of tension and continuing to stage large-scale joint military drills together with the south Korean puppet forces. 
					
					 The statement expressed the will to actively support the measures taken by the DPRK to protect the sovereignty and dignity of the nation and the supreme interests of the country, and conduct colorful events for solidarity in the month of international solidarity with the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded by Russian Papers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded by Russian Papers
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Russian papers dedicated special write-ups on June 25 and 27 to the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Pri Armurskiye Wedomostsi carried an article titled "Distinguished leader in the 20th century", illustrated with a portrait of smiling President.
					
					 It praised the President as the great master in ideology and theory who founded the Juche idea and Songun idea to indicate the road of the human cause of independence and the distinguished leader who led the cause of global independence to victory, holding high the banner of independence against imperialism all his life.
					
					 It lauded him as the peerless great saint who attracted all people with his noble traits.
					
					 Byvor devoted its one whole page to an article titled "Socialist system serving the popular masses", illustrated with a portrait of smiling President.
					
					 It said the DPRK is a country in which the idea of believing in people as in Heaven, the motto of the President, is embodied, adding that the idea serves as the fundamental idea of the party and state of the DPRK and the basis and starting point of all its lines and policies.
					
					 Khabarovski Express carried an article titled "Strength of idea is unlimited", illustrated with a photo of the President. The article introduced the glorious course of the Korean revolution which has emerged ever-victorious under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea and the Songun idea.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats for National Reunification Lauded by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats for National Reunification Lauded by Nigerian Organization
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article on its website on June 27 on the occasions of the 20th anniversary of the last autograph left by President Kim Il Sung on the historic document related to the reunification of Korea and the 42nd anniversary of the publication of the July 4 joint statement.
					 In an article titled "Kim Il Sung, for reunified Korea" the website said that the President always placed the great national unity before anything else for the reunification of the country and made sure that everything was subordinated to it.
					
					 He set forth the three principles of national reunification--independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity--the keynote of the July 4 joint statement, it noted.
					
					 "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" advanced by the President is the great programme of the Korean people and is called the three charters for national reunification together with the three principles of national reunification and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo, it said.
					
					 It noted that he left his autograph "Kim Il Sung July 7, 1994" on the document related to national reunification in the last period of his life.
					
					 The autograph was engraved on the granite monument at Panmunjom close to the Military Demarcation Line bisecting the Korean peninsula into the north and the south, conveying long the undying feats performed by the President who dedicated himself to the reunification of Korea, it said.
					
					 It also said that he put forward the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo at the Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea 30 odd years ago.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Venezuela
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Venezuela
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Barquisimeto City, Lara State, Venezuela on June 30.
					Yecenia Garcia, chief of the Venezuelan Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					The committee decided to organize events on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of the President.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Venezuelan Personage
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Venezuelan Personage
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Omar Lopez, chairman of the Venezuelan National Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, spoke highly of President Kim Il Sung's exploits.
					 At the inaugural meeting of the committee for remembering the President held in Barquisimeto City of Lara State in Venezuela on June 30, Omar Lopez said:
					
					 The President was born into a poor family and embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years. He was a savior of the Korean nation who liberated Korea by waging the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle for 20 years.
					
					 He was a brilliant strategist who wisely led the army and people and won a brilliant victory in the war which was ignited by the U.S. imperialists to stifle the DPRK in the early 1950s.
					
					 He was also a genius of creation and construction who built the DPRK into a powerful country independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence on the debris of war.
					
					 He most successfully settled the issue of succession to the revolutionary cause and opened a bright prospect of invariably carrying forward the banner of socialism and revolutionary cause.
					
					 Today the Korean people are led by Marshal Kim Jong Un who is identical to the President. They are stepping up the building of an economic power while adhering to the anti-imperialist independent stand.
					
					 To support the just cause of the Korean people is our basic duty as we are standing on the common front against imperialism.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Different Countries
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks were held in Mongolia, Angola and Ethiopia from June 17 to 26 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The general secretary of the Mongolian People's Party praised the President as a prominent leader in the 20th century who made great contributions to the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 The DPRK demonstrated its might as a full-fledged independent and sovereign state under the wise leadership of the President, he noted.
					
					 The honorary chairman of the Angolan committee for remembering the President said:
					
					 The President was a great leader of progressive mankind who rendered positive support to the African people in their struggle to achieve the national liberation and build a new society.
					
					 His life of total dedication and exploits will go down forever as he devoted his whole life to justice, truth and the accomplishment of the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Chinese Paper Introduces Kimilsungia, Kimjongilia
articles.content:
Chinese Paper Introduces Kimilsungia, Kimjongilia
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Chinese Huan Qiu Shibao carried an article dedicated by its correspondent residing in Pyongyang titled "Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia loved by Korean people" on June 30.
					 The paper said:
					
					 Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia are among the most famous flowers in the DPRK.
					
					 Kimilsungia is an orchid plant cultivated in Indonesia. It is said that Indonesian President Sukarno named the flower Kimilsungia in reverence for President Kim Il Sung when he visited Indonesia in 1965.
					
					 Kimjongilia is a perennial plant of Begonia family cultivated by Mototeru Kamo in Japan. He named the flower after Kim Jong Il and presented it to him on his 46th birthday in 1988.
					
					 The Korean people really love these two flowers.
					
					 On the national holidays of the DPRK including the birth anniversaries of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia festivals are held with splendor at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition on the bank of the River Taedong.
					
					 The festivals are visited by lots of people, an indication of reverence of the army and people of the DPRK for Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted on Website and Internet Magazines of Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Posted on Website and Internet Magazines of Russia
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Go All Out for Victory in the War" was posted by the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK on its website and on the internet magazine Hanber Journal and another internet magazine on June 25 and 26.
					 The work, a radio speech made by him to all the Korean people on June 26, Juche 39 (1950), deals with the efforts exerted by the DPRK government to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea and lays bare the aim sought by the U.S. imperialists and the Syngman Rhee puppet clique in igniting the war of aggression.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for winning the final victory in the war.
					
					 The website and magazines carried his photos.

articles.title: Events for Solidarity with Korean People Held Abroad
articles.content:
Events for Solidarity with Korean People Held Abroad
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Meetings for solidarity with the Korean people took place in Cuba and Bulgaria on June 26 and 30 in the June 25-July 27 month of the anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 Present at the meetings were personages and masses of relevant countries. 
					
					 The director of a research institute in Cuba said in a speech that the Korean people are the heroic people firmly defending their sovereignty against the U.S. imperialists. 
					
					 The Cuban people sincerely hope that the Korean people would achieve great successes in the struggle for defending their sovereignty and building a thriving nation in the future, too, he noted. 
					
					 The secretary general of the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association said that the army and people of the DPRK, rallied close around President Kim Il Sung, inflicted a disgraceful defeat on the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world in the three-year war. 
					
					 A message to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held in Bulgaria. 
					
					 Meanwhile, a Korean film week was held in Nigeria from June 18 to 25. 
					
					 Films shown included Korean films exposing the true colors of the U.S. imperialists as the provoker of the Korean war and introducing Songun Korea.
